problem: Given K is the midpoint of HJ. K is the midpoint of GI and HJ . Complete the proof that IJ∥GH . (Elements:  IK ,  ∠GHK ,  HK ,  ∠IKJ ,  △IJK ,  △GHK ,  GK ,  ∠GKH ,  GH ,  JK ,  IJ ,  ∠IJK , )
statement: K is the midpoint of GI
K is the midpoint of HJ
